title: MARGUERITE, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE COLLAR NECKLACE
description: An eye-catching collar featuring 44.80 carats of flower-shaped lab-grown white sapphires in a sterling silver setting. The 16-inch Marguerite collar layers effortlessly with the 15-inch Kate collar.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Setting: Cluster set
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Width, Top to Bottom of Flower: 4mm



16 inch, 44.80 CTW DEW

What is Lab-Grown?
